alternativeNames: Mirachmedova, M.M.; Mirakhmedova, M.M.; Machmudova, Mamlakat Mirganiyevna
comments: Mirachmedova is maiden name. Works at the National University of Uzbekistan (the faculty of Biology).
examples: Potentilla sect. Fedtschenkoana Mirachm. in Uzb. Biol. Zhurn., 1998(3): 32 (1998).
source: IK db. Forenames and year of birth from Obidjon Turdiboyev pers. comm.
